filmography.title: Films of Nature
filmography.description: An ambient visual journey through natural landscapes, synchronized with atmospheric soundscapes from the Interstellar Packages catalog.

filmography.title: Tidal
filmography.description: A meditative exploration of coastal rhythms and oceanic textures, blending visual poetry with minimalist sound design.

filmography.title: Serenity
filmography.description: A cinematic visualization of Lynn's coaching philosophy, exploring themes of inner peace and mindfulness.

filmography.title: The Sakura Kimonos
filmography.description: A visual story of traditional Japanese craftsmanship and contemporary application in Lynn's coaching practice.

filmography.title: Jikan
filmography.description: An exploration of time ('jikan' in Japanese) and its perception in different cultural contexts and mindfulness practices.

filmography.title: ARACNA
filmography.description: A surreal journey through Tanya's web-inspired installations, exploring themes of connection and entrapment.
